description: A very simple home, for instance a tiny flat in a large city. Enough to store some items or get some rest.
A decent home that has one special facility available, like a workshop, science lab or similar.
A luxury home with many amenities, including a butler (alive or servitor) and security systems.
A tiny space station, probably more of a hideout carved in an asteroid. It can house a tiny crew of around 5 people to rest and hide, and only dock a single ship.
A regular space station, mostly used for mining, maintenance or some other specialized use case. It has enough amenities to house up to 50 people.
A formidable space station that serves as a hub for trade, networking and other services. It can house up to 1000 people.

Speed: 35 (1 for hex-combat)
Maneuverability: 2
Hull: 8
Armor Durability: 2
Passengers: 4

Equipped with an auto-pilot system (5 pool and 2 expertise).

Passengers: 2

Equipped with off-road tires, reducing penalties for uneven ground.

Has an automatic turret system installed, using the profile of a Machine Gun, it has a pool of 6 with 3 expertise.

Hovers up to 5m above ground.

Speed: 40 (1 for hex-combat)
Maneuverability: 2
Hull: 7
Armor Durability: 3
Passengers: 4

Features a built-in AI navigation system and emergency auto-landing features.
Increases the speed by 20% (round down). Can be installed up to two times.
Provides the vehicle with +1 Primary Soak. Can be installed up to two times.
Allows to install a regular firearm that will be fix-mounted in one direction - the weapon has to be paid separately. Can be installed up to two times.
